item.description:
So spring is here, and that means its time to get out, enjoy the weather and play with our balls....softballs, basketballs, wiffleballs or the occasional shuttlecock...

You get the picture, the nice weather is finally here and it's time to get out and enjoy it. We will be meeting at East Rock Park (by the ranger station at Orange St. and Cold Spring St.) to play.

No set plan as to what we'll be doing as of yet, all depends on who shows up and what people have to bring with them.

I'll be there with a portable badminton/volleyball net, bocce ball set and a frisbee.

Bring all your sports-related accessories if you have any, plus any extras for those people who might not and we'll just go from there.

Contact: Jeanie (860) 942-4708
item.name: Cocks of Fury
